name: Battle for Graxia
description:
Battle for Graxia is an action, RPG and strategy game developed by Petroglyph. It was originally released in 2013. Petroglyph published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Battle for Graxia on PC.
Steve Wetherill produced the game. It was scored by Frank Klepacki.
